participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Megan enjoys expressing herself through music and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time. I enjoy golfing. I have a truck for my weekend adventures and a leased car for my daily commute. I am from Austin, Texas. I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and family-oriented, James takes pride in his work and cherishes quality time with his loved ones.
participant_2.background: I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city. I love family time. I never work more than 4 days in a row. I love The Walking Dead. I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.

content.text: Hey, I'm from Austin, Texas as well!
Oh cool! I'm a police officer here, what do you do for work?
I work in the marketing department for a local tech company.
That sounds interesting! What's your favorite part about your job?
I love coming up with new marketing campaigns and seeing the results.
That must be really rewarding! Do you have any hobbies?
I love to golf and go to concerts!
Oh that's cool! I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time.
Me too! I'm not a morning person, but I'll get up early for a good concert.
Yeah, me neither! I usually sleep in until noon on the weekends.
I love spending my weekends outdoors. Do you have any favorite outdoor activities?
I love going camping and hiking
